title: Pure Fix Originals – DTLA
description: Our Original Series take to the streets where they were born, downtown LA. From bike lanes to bridges, skyscrapers to Sunset, and everything in between – Pure Fix is all about freedom, movement, and getting out there. Come ride with us. http://purefixcycles.com

title: Encino Velodrome 'Swap Your Legs' Race
description: Saturday, March 15th, the Pure Fix // .elohssa team ventured out to the Encino Velodrome to race, hang and have a good time. Here's the full, unabridged video, per your request! Enjoy!

title: Pure Fix Track Series: The Hustle.
description:
New track frames.  New race team.  A whole new level of speed.

Pure Fix Racing's Angel and Jason mash the mean streets of LA to prep for the first race of the season.  Watch the video a few times because once the season starts you'll only ever see these guys from behind.

Get yours: http://purefixcycles.com/pages/keirin-track-bikes

title: Pure Fix Cycles x Revolights
description: We’ve teamed up with Revolights to create something truly awesome.  A simple formula, take a fixed gear Juliet, build in some lights, make it epic.  Introducing the Revo Juliet. Get yours: http://purefixcycles.com/revo

title: Plutonium x Pure Fix Cycles
description:
One of our favorite visual artists, Ryan Humphrey, took one of our bikes and made magic! With a bit of Plutonium and heaps of artistry, Humphrey turned one of our Papas into a work of art.

Don't forget to check out Dave's Wearhouse in Chinatown to hang with our buddy Dave (from the video) and pick up some fresh new gear for Summertime in NYC! Say hi for us!

--
http://purefixcycles.com
http://humphreyindustries.com/
http://www.plutoniumpaint.com/
http://www.daveswearhouse.com/

title: Pure Fix in the City
description: Nights in NYC? Let's ride! Our friend Char Dawes is riding her Delta around Washington Square Park by NYU and Taylor's cruising the LES on her X-Ray. Thanks to the Cantora Records dudes for letting us use their place!

title: Pure Fix TV at INTERBIKE 2012
description: What happens in Vegas doesn't always stay in Vegas.  This week, Amanda gives you a first-hand look at the awesomeness that was Interbike 2012.  Marvel in all the bike-filled glory...MARVEL!

title: Handle it!
description: You asked for it and we listened! Here is the video that will show you everything you need to know about handlebars.  Why use bullhorns over risers?  What the heck are drop bars?  How do I even put my bars on!?  These will all be answered on this week's Pure Fix TV.

title: Pure Fix Cycles - Glow Series
description: Get ready to take your night riding to a whole new level. After months of experimentation, we've perfected the GLOW, our newest line. The name says it all it actually glows. The paint is solar-activated, so just give your bike an hour of daytime sun for an hour plus of night-time fun. Whether you۪re a night owl, a raver, or just want to trip out your friends, this is the bike for you.

title: How to stop your Fixie
description: Our latest episode on Pure Fix TV is all about the infamous skid-stop. The skid-stop is a stopping technique that many fixed gear riders employ to help them more briskly come to a stop. In this episode, we'll teach you different techniques on how to best use this stopping method, how it helps, and how to stay safe, while doing it. Enjoy!

title: Bike Anatomy: The in's and out's of fixed gear bikes and everything they're made of
description: Bike Anatomy - In this episode, Amanda breaks down the fixie, part by part, explaining the essential components of a fixed gear bike.

title: Pure Fix Cycles at the Wolfpack Hustle Drag Race
description:
If you missed it, we sponsored the Wolfpack Hustle Drag Race and it was one of the greatest fixed-gear events that we have been involved with.  A drag race shows who is truly the fastest rider and this race did precisely that. The 1,000 feet straight away located in the famous 2nd St. tunnel in Downtown, LA proved that Tim McGee (23.55 seconds) and Beatriz Rodriguez (28.08 seconds) were the fastest fixed-gear riders in all of Los Angeles.

Tim and Beatriz beat out 200 other riders and did it in front of over 1,500 people who showed up to watch the race.

title: The Inverted Bike Shop
description:
Among the choices of bike shops across Manhattan and Brooklyn, 718 Cyclery stands out for their unique approach to the customer and the bike they lovingly create for them. This is the Inverted Bike Shop.

We were honored to have our film selected in the official line up of the New York 2012 Bicycle Film Festival (bicyclefilmfestival.com).

description:
Pure Fix Cycles, A Day in LA, Part 2: A city influenced short, featuring a classic, street savvy trio of fixie riders navigating the mellow wilderness that is Los Angeles. Starring Geo, Leen and Future.

title: TRAFIK Burner Bottle by LEEN
description:
Available HERE: http://trafikla.bigcartel.com/product/trafik-waterbottle-stickerpack

TRAFIK presents the Burner Bottle by LEEN. Bring Art to the Streets when you rock this custom designed water bottle around town. Designed by Los Angeles street artist LEEN, this thirst-quenching burner fits all cycling bottle holsters. Are those girls checking out your bike or your waterbottle? Better go talk to 'em. Stay thirsty my friends. 

All Bottles are also Stickerpacks, filled with TRAFIK vinyl decals and "To Live & Ride in L.A." cell phone stickers.

This is a limited edition item, it won't be around forever. Get yours at the TRAFIK Online STORE: http://trafikla.bigcartel.com/

Bottle deets... 
*24 oz. Capacity 
*BPA Free LDPE Plastic 
*BioGreen Biodegradable Plastic 
*Soft and Squeezable 
*Wide Mouth Opening 
*Push/Pull Rubberized Cap

Special Thanks to:
